Text: Please Comment On This, Is It Real Or Fake!

Works Great!  Installation was a breeze with the KeyGen included.  Follow these steps in order after extracting:

Disable Network Adapter
Run:  CorelDRAWGraphicsSuiteX5Installer_EN.exe
Select:  I Have a Serial Number
Generate Serial number using the KeyGen, enter the serial number and install
Once Installation is complete, run CorelDraw X5
Select:  Other Activation Options
Select:  Phone Corel
Type the Installation code provided by Corel into the Installation Code section of the KeyGen
Click:  Activation Code
Copy the new activation code and paste it in Corel
Click:  Continue
Click:  Close
You're Done!
